summary.para: Gets points from the points array.

param.name: pointsCount
param.para: The element count of the buffer.

param.name: startIndex
param.para: The index of the first point to retrieve.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets the number of points in the array.

returns.para: Returns the number of points in the array.

summary.para: Removes points from the end of the array.

param.name: pointsCount
param.para: Specifies how many points to remove.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Updates the points array. Existing points not updated by this method are preserved. The array is resized larger if necessary to accommodate the new points.

param.name: pointsCount
param.para: The number of points to update.

param.name: startIndex
param.para: The index at which to begin updating points. Must be less than or equal to the size of the array.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Interface describing an SVG points value in a polyline or polygon element.
